books.author: by Tessa Bailey
books.description: Hannah Bellinger begins to fall for her roommate, who is a fisherman and a notorious ladies’ man.
books.name: HOOK, LINE, AND SINKER

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: Jess has suspicions about her half-brother’s neighbors when he goes missing.
books.name: THE PARIS APARTMENT

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The 18th book in the GhostWalker series. Jonas must convince Camellia to not run away from him.
books.name: PHANTOM GAME

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The second book in the Crescent City series. Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar must choose to fight or stay silent.
books.name: HOUSE OF SKY AND BREATH

books.author: by Rebecca Serle
books.description: During a summer trip in Italy, Katy’s late mother reappears as a 30-year-old woman.
books.name: ONE ITALIAN SUMMER

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Ali Hazelwood
books.description: A young professor agrees to pretend to be a third-year Ph.D. candidate’s boyfriend.
books.name: THE LOVE HYPOTHESIS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.
books.name: SOOLEY

books.author: by Nita Prose
books.description: When a wealthy man is found dead in his room, a maid at the Regency Grand Hotel becomes a lead suspect.
books.name: THE MAID

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.
books.name: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY

books.author: by Olivie Blake
books.description: Atlas Blakely recruits six candidates to fight for five spots in a secret society of magical academicians.
books.name: THE ATLAS SIX

books.author: by Ellery Lloyd
books.description: Off the English coast, the body count rises at a celebrity members’ club.
books.name: THE CLUB
